							Stack
DESCRIPTION

This section will guide you to: 

● Write a program in Java to insert and remove elements in a stack
● Use Eclipse (the popular text editor for Java programs) 
● Push code to Git

package stack;
import java.util.*;

public class StackOperation 
{

	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Stack<Integer> s = new Stack<>();
		s.add(40);
		s.add(50);
		s.add(60);
		s.add(70);
		System.out.println("Stack is : "+s);
		s.pop();
		System.out.println("Stack after removing :" +s);
		

	}

}

OUTPUT:

Stack is : [40, 50, 60, 70]
Stack after removing :[40, 50, 60]
